jacdac.SwitchEvent.Off: Emitted when switch goes from `on` to `off`.
jacdac.SwitchEvent.On: Emitted when switch goes from `off` to `on`.
jacdac.SwitchReg.Active:
Read-only bool (uint8_t). Indicates whether the switch is currently active (on).
* ```
const [active] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u8")
```
jacdac.SwitchReg.Variant:
Constant Variant (uint8_t). Describes the type of switch used.
* ```
const [variant] = jdunpack<[jacdac.SwitchVariant]>(buf, "u8")
```
modules.SwitchClient: A switch, which keeps its position.
modules.SwitchClient.active: Indicates whether the switch is currently active (on).
modules.SwitchClient.onEvent: Register code to run when an event is raised
modules.SwitchClient.onOff: Emitted when switch goes from `on` to `off`.
modules.SwitchClient.onOn: Emitted when switch goes from `off` to `on`.
modules.SwitchClient.variant: Describes the type of switch used.
